newsitem.title: UK: NWE gasoline rebounds with futures, Polish demand.
newsitem.headline: NWE gasoline rebounds with futures, Polish demand.

text.p: NWE gasoline prices rebounded from early losses to end with gains of $1-$2, helped by a rebound in NYMEX futures and buying interest from Poland a tight barge market, traders said.
Premium unleaded barges traded early at $236.50/$237 fob ARA, then offers moved up to $240 by late in the day, up $1 from Monday.
Nov swaps early on also traded at $229, down $2, before rising later in the day to $231.50/$232.50.
Traders said gasoline tracked crude futures, which showed smaller gains than the gasoline counterpart.
